<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E1.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="{H_{C}}=\frac{\text{H^{+}\,-\,H^{-}}}{\text{2}},{H_{Eb}}=\frac{\text{H^{+}\,+%
